backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the viewport‑safe NoButton fix to its source file and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend Valentine components, styles, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining extensive OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls the three‑screen Valentine flow, switching between opening, transition, and celebration views.
frontend/src/components/valentine/consta: Defines text, emoji, and message constants for the Valentine UI screens.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FinalC: Renders the final screen with floating hearts, teddy bear GIF, emoji row, and optional music playback.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Firewo: Canvas animation generating pink fireworks with rising rockets, burst rings, and particle effects.
frontend/src/components/valentine/NoButt: A moving 'No' button that randomizes its position while ensuring it stays fully within viewport bounds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Opening screen showing the Valentine question, cycling 'No' messages, hearts animation, and buttons.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PopHea: Animates randomly spawning hearts with timed removal, capped at eight visible at once.
frontend/src/components/valentine/YesTra: Shows a fade‑to‑black overlay and triggers fireworks before calling onComplete after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom Valentine color variables and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in query and identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements and an issue about constraining the “No” button to stay fully within the viewport.
